comment.author: 43502495@N03
comment._content: A closer inspection of the man's cap indicates he was a member of Co.G 15th NHV, not 12th. This would also indicate that the photo was likely taken in October 1862 (time of the unit's formation) as Co G was sent to Louisiana by way of NY in November and did not return to NH until the following year.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you for the information jademonkey74. We'll look into it, and update the record if necessary.
